input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Appearance has a direct effect on fame. Talent has a direct effect on fame. Method 1: We look at how appearance correlates with talent case by case according to fame. Method 2: We look directly at how appearance correlates with talent in general. To understand how appearance affects talent, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
